alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 5:52PM CST until November 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to an inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Hemphill, Hutchinson, and Roberts Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Possible 1 to 2 inch snow amounts southeast of Canadian from highway 60 east and along Highway 33.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
